HotelElement.Name: Dessole Pyramisa Sharm el Sheikh Resort

Description.Text: Dessole Pyramisa Sharm el Sheikh Resort is a luxurious 5-star hotel promising exemplary facilities and stylish accommodation, overlooking the Red Sea. Highlights include several swimming pools and a diverse selection of bars and restaurants. Located on Sharks bay, the hotel is a fantastic base from which to explore the surrounding area, thanks in part to its bike and car rental services. In nearby Naama bay there are numerous shops and restaurants, as well as a casino. There are also colourful handicraft stands celebrating the Bedouin culture. Further afield, the Ras Mohammed national park is home to beautiful reefs and interesting wildlife. The hotel occupies a large estate populated with bright white properties in the local style. Facilities include a beautiful outdoor swimming pool, indoor pool, four tennis courts, a squash court, fitness centre, sauna, steam room, whirlpool, and spa offering a range of beauty and massage treatments. There is also a kids club along with pool and ping-pong tables. Chargeable Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. The Tai Pan restaurant offers delicious Chinese cuisine in a charming and authentic setting. Da Angelo offers Italian cuisine. Tahiti offers a buffet menu of international dishes. The bar serves a range of hot and cold beverages and provides musical entertainment. Garden View rooms are 35sqm and tastefully designed, featuring a bright classic decor, tiled floor and balcony or terrace. Amenities include a fridge, satellite TV and en-suite bathroom with bathtub. The hotel provides 24-hour room service. The hotel offers a chargeable shuttle service to the city centre.
